title: SpaceX xAI? Musk Signals AI Alliance That Could Reshape the Race
filename: spacex xai? musk signals ai alliance that could reshape the race
author: Aethio
excerpt: An analysis of the reported merger/strategic alliance between SpaceX and xAI, breaking down what xAI is, why a SpaceX–AI merger matters, and how it could affect AI development, regulatory scrutiny, and competition. The piece would also discuss potential synergies with aerospace ventures, funding implications, and what this tells us about Elon Musk’s broader AI strategy.

title: QuitGPT: The Campaign to Ditch ChatGPT Over OpenAI's Political Ties
filename: quitgpt: the campaign to ditch chatgpt over openai's political ties
author: Aethio
excerpt: A political-tech movement is urging users to abandon ChatGPT due to perceived ties between OpenAI and political figures or enforcement actions. The piece would investigate who is behind the campaign, what claims are being made, how OpenAI has responded, and what this means for trust and governance around AI products.
